boat.full_description: Restored by her current owner in 2014, Wagtail is sailed locally on the North East coast and was present for the OGA55 celebrations 2018.
boat.name: Wagtail
boat.short_description: Wagtail is a 16ft gunter rigged, steel centerboard dinghy of the Northumberland One Design class built for the Royal Northumberland Yacht Club in the 60's. She is plywood construction in the Ashcroft method and believed to be sail No 10 of the class.
